info.title: Park Information
info.welcomeSubtitle: Your family amusement park in the heart of Germany
info.welcomeText: Since 1987, we have been providing unforgettable experiences for the whole family. With over 30 attractions, shows and dining options, there's something for everyone!

transport.title: ðŸš— Directions & Parking
transport.shuttle: Shuttle service from station (â‚¬2 per person)

accessibility.title: â™¿ Accessibility
accessibility.wheelchairPaths: âœ… All main paths wheelchair accessible
accessibility.wheelchairToilets: âœ… Disabled toilets in every area
accessibility.wheelchairRental: âœ… Free wheelchair rental (subject to availability)
accessibility.inductionLoops: âœ… Induction loops at service points

rules.title: ðŸ“‹ Park Rules
rules.privateAllowed: âœ… Private photos and videos allowed
rules.heightRequirement: â€¢ Note height requirements (90cm - 140cm depending on attraction)

emergency.title: ðŸš¨ Park Emergency
emergency.description: In case of medical emergencies or other issues, please contact immediately:
emergency.location: First aid stations are located in Family Area (main station), Thrill Zone and Adventure Land.

info.footer: Adventure Land - Where dreams come true! ðŸŽ¢âœ¨

thunderMountain.title: NEW ROLLER COASTER "Thunder Mountain" opens!
thunderMountain.content: The spectacular new roller coaster "Thunder Mountain" is now open! At 65 meters high and speeds up to 85 km/h, it offers pure thrills. First test riders are thrilled with the 7 loops and 360-degree corkscrew.

summerFest.title: Summer Festival July 15-17
summerFest.content: Our big summer festival is coming up! Three days full of live music, street performers and a spectacular fireworks display every evening at 10:00 PM. Special food trucks offer international cuisine.

pizzaStation.title: Pizza Station "Mama Mia" newly opened
pizzaStation.content: In the heart of Thrill Zone, our new pizza station has opened! Authentic Italian pizzas from the stone oven, prepared by real Italian chefs. Try the specialty "Thunder Mountain" with spicy salami!

familyDiscount.title: Family discount extended
familyDiscount.content: Due to high demand, we are extending our family discount! Families with 2 adults and 2 children pay only â‚¬80 instead of â‚¬96. Valid until the end of August 2024.

circus.title: Circus "Fantasia" visits the park
circus.content: The famous Circus "Fantasia" will be with us all summer! Shows daily at 2:00 PM and 4:30 PM in the large amphitheater. Acrobatics, clowns and wild animals provide entertainment for the whole family.

newParking.title: New parking in Sector C
newParking.content: We have opened 200 additional parking spaces in the new Sector C. Free parking for all visitors, only a 3-minute walk to the main entrance. Disabled parking spaces available directly at the entrance.

intro.title: Welcome to our dining!
intro.text: From authentic Italian pizza to German classics - we have something for every taste!

pizzaQuattro.name: Pizza Quattro Stagioni
pizzaQuattro.description: Four seasons with mushrooms, ham, artichokes

bbqBurger.name: BBQ Bacon Burger
bbqBurger.description: BBQ sauce, roasted onions, crispy bacon

caesarSalad.name: Caesar Salad
caesarSalad.description: Romaine lettuce, parmesan, croutons, Caesar dressing

map.title: Park Map

overview.title: ðŸ—ºï¸ Adventure Land Overview
overview.text: Our 85-hectare park is divided into three themed areas. Use the free park app for GPS navigation or follow the colored signs on site.

thrill.description: For adrenaline junkies and thrill seekers

support.title: Help & Support
support.heroTitle: We are here to help quickly
support.heroText: Here you will find answers to the most common questions about rides, photos, payments and your account.
support.faq1Question: How can I find my purchased photos?
support.faq1Answer: Open the gallery and switch to My purchased photos. There you can see all unlocked photos.
support.faq2Question: Why is an image not downloading?
support.faq2Answer: Make sure the image has already been purchased and your internet connection is stable. On mobile, media permission may also be required.
support.faq3Question: How can I change email or password?
support.faq3Answer: Go to Profile and then Edit profile. There you can update account details. Depending on the action, re-authentication may be required.
support.faq4Question: Why is my name not showing in the daily ranking?
support.faq4Answer: The ranking uses your fastest unlocked speed. Check that your profile data is saved and that at least one image was purchased.
support.faq5Question: How do I unsubscribe from the newsletter?
support.faq5Answer: Under Profile > Notifications, you can enable or disable newsletter and popup notifications at any time.
support.reportProblemText: Please describe your issue as precisely as possible: affected ride, time, screenshot and device used. This helps us support you faster.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.section1Text: The operator of Liftpictures is responsible for data processing in this app. If you have privacy questions, contact us at support@liftpictures.app.
privacy.section2Intro: In particular, we process the following data:
privacy.section2Bullet1: â€¢ Account data (email, first name, last name, optional display name)
privacy.section2Bullet2: â€¢ Usage data (rides, purchased images, favorites, cart)
privacy.section2Bullet3: â€¢ Payment-related metadata (e.g. Stripe transaction references)
privacy.section2Bullet4: â€¢ Voluntary data (e.g. newsletter subscription, profile picture)
privacy.section3Bullet1: â€¢ Provision of the app and user management
privacy.section3Bullet2: â€¢ Display and unlocking of purchased photos
privacy.section3Bullet3: â€¢ Payment processing and fraud prevention
privacy.section4Text: Depending on context, processing is based on contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR), legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR), or your consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR), e.g. for newsletters.
privacy.section5Text: We store personal data only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or as required by law. You can change newsletter settings at any time in the app.
privacy.section6Text: We use technical service providers (e.g. hosting, database, payment processing). Data is shared only as necessary and on the basis of data processing agreements.
privacy.section7Bullet3: â€¢ Deletion or restriction of processing
privacy.section7Text: To exercise your rights, please contact us via the support section.
privacy.section8Text: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against loss, misuse and unauthorized access.
privacy.section9Text: We may update this privacy notice when needed. The current version is always available on this page.
